name: Exolon VR (beta)
description:
If the game above doesn't work, please use this link instead: stevesmith16384.github.io/exolonvr/

Instructions

  • Use the triggers to shoot the laser and fire the rockets
  • To use the teleporters, touch the small box in the middle that is attached to the top of the teleporter with your left hand.
  • You have infinite rockets

Compatibility

  • I use an Oculus Quest 2 to develop this.  If you've got a different headset, please let me know if it works or otherwise.

Notes

  • Currently, the whole of level 1 is recreated
